<< true logical type functions

xor

Exclusive or.

Syntax

R = xor(V1, V2)
R = xor(V1, V2, ... , VN)

Input argument

V1

a matrix.

V2

a matrix, same dimensions than V1.

VN

a matrix, same dimensions than V1.

Output argument

R

a logical matrix.

Description

xor performs a logical exclusive-OR.

Example

x = [0 1 0 1];
y = [0 0 1 1];
R = xor(x, y)

See also

or, and.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
